title: 🟡 Bugcrowd Disclosure: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Comment System...
content:
🟡 **Bugcrowd Security Disclosure**

**Title:** Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Comment System
**Priority:** MEDIUM
**Target:** tech-startup
**Hunter:** @xss_hunter

💸 **Bounty:** $1,500 awarded!

**Vulnerability Type:** Cross-Site Scripting

**Brief:**
A stored XSS vulnerability in the comment system allows attackers to inject malicious scripts that execute in other users' browsers.

**Impact:** Account takeover and data theft through session hijacking

🔗 **Submission:** https://bugcrowd.com/submissions/BC-789012

#Bugcrowd #CrowdsourcedSecurity #VulnResearch #MediumPriority #CyberSecurity
